Text: Gas PoweRisk Cc Dear Speaker Gas PoweRisk Sofitel Hotel Paris From th th November I am delighted that you will be joining us to speak at the Gas PoweRisk conference Please note that copies of the printed brochure will be sent in the post for you and your colleagues plus you can also view the brochure via our website wwwicbiukcompowerisk I would be grateful if you could just take a moment to look through the items we would like from you prior to the conference to help ensure everything runs smoothly on the day Your AdministrationPreparation Details weeks to go You will find attached the following forms AV FORMS please tick and fill in and fax back immediately HOTEL FORMS please tick and fill in and fax direct to the hotel MARKETING FORM Information for our marketing department please fill in and send back as soon as possible Friday th October A Hard Copy Of Your Documentation weeks to go We would like a hard black white copy of your presentation bullet pointscopy of slides whichever is best for you to insert into the delegate documentation We can receive this by post or email if the documents are not too complex but we try not to insert fax copies as copy quality is poor email address NB Even if you plan to speak off the cuff we would urge that you submit at least an outline of your speech to us for insertion into the delegate pack by the above date The most consistent complaint that we have from delegates is that not all speakers offer hard copies of their presentation If you are unable to make this deadline please could you inform us as soon as possible so that we can make alternative arrangements and avoid printing delay Should you have any queries regarding your participation at the conference please contact me as I will be looking after the domestic side of the event You can me on Thank you once again for joining us and I look forward to seeing you in Paris With kind regards Victoria Thomas Logistics Manager ICBI Tel Fax Email DISCLAIMER The information in this message is confidential and may be legally privileged It is intended solely for the addressee Access to this message by anyone else is unauthorised If you are not the intended recipient any disclosure copying or distribution of the message or any action or omission taken by you in reliance on it is prohibited and may be unlawful Please immediately contact the sender if you have received this message in error Thank you marketingdoc AV formdoc hotelbookingformdoc
